body.name: Dash Cam Front and Rear, Dash Camera for Cars WiFi/APP Control Dual Dashcam W/ 64GB Card, 2.5K Dash Cam Front+1080P Rear Car Camera W/Super Night Vision, Loop Recording, G-Sensor, Max Support 256GB
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 27 mins
Or fastest pickup Sunday, February 18. Order within 27 mins
features: 🚗💥【2.5K Dash Cam Front and Rear Dash Camera】- 2.5K Dash Cam Front + 1080P Rear dashcams for cars comes with 64GB Card (Max support 256GB), car camera simultaneously records front at 2.5K(2560*1440P@30fps) and rear at 1080P(1920×1080@30fps), which provides crystal clear video quality to read license plates during day and night. 170°front and 140°rear wide angles reduce blind spots, car cam perfect for daily driving and unexpected incidents.NOTE: turn OFF the “REAR MIRROR” when you reversing.

🌸🚗【Front and Rear Dash Cam Built-in WiFi & App Control】- The dash camera for cars can be connected to your iOS or Android smartphone app via built-in WiFi, using the "Viidure" app to view, play and manage the car dashboard cam. You can also download and edit videos in the app, and one-click sharing allows you to share your travel landscapes and beautiful moments with friends and family. Please note: The effective distance is 3-5 meters, and the dual dash cam does not support remote connection.

🚙🌈【WiFi Dash Cam with Super Night Vision】- Dash cam front is equipped W/ high-resolution CMOS sensor and excellent 6-layer optical lens W/ F1.8 large aperture, Camara para carro equipped W/ HDR/WDR technology, the camera for car can automatically balance the exposure in low-light conditions to achieve superb night vision, even at night and in rainy weather car camera - dash cam front and rear can ensure perfect video clips. NOTE: Please use original car charger to charge the car dash camera.

💫🚐【Easy to Set Up & Front and Rear Dash Camera Comes 2 Suction Cups】- The dash cam's simple interface is intuitive to set up, plug power all the way into car cigar lighter (built-in lithium battery is only for emergency recording when parked) and car camera will start recording. 3" IPS screen dashcams for cars front and rear takes up tight space in the car and doesn't obstruct your view while driving. Dashboard camera with a 19-foot rear camera cable, dash cams perfect for trucks, vans, SUVs.

🚗🌴【Dash Camera for Cars Front and Rear Reliable Features for Accident Recording】- The dash cam front has seamless loop recording, when 64GB card is full, latest videos will overwrite the oldest videos (except locked files), and the current video will be automatically locked once the dashcams W/G-sensor detects shaking or collision to prevent it from being overwritten by loop recording and saved in the event folder for easy viewing. Dual dash cam front and rear 24/7 recording need hardwire kit.

🚗🌴【Dash Cam Front and Rear with Reverse Camera】- WiFi Dash Cam comes with a reverse camera. With this dash camera, you not only monitor the road situation in front of and behind the car, but also provide you with a reversing aid line to help you reverse safely. Connect the red kit of rear car camera with the positive pole of reversing light, it will appear reversing mode when you parking. Dashcam's car charger has USB port, you can charge other electronic device while charging car dash camera.

🚗💥【Upgrated 1080P Rear Camera】- Rear car cam of dashcam front and rear camera sold on market is 720P, as professional das hcam seller and supplier, we have improved picture quality of rear camera according to customer feedback, from 720P to 1080P. Provide customers w/ affordable dash cam. Upgrated Type C charger, Compared w/ traditional mini USB, Type C charger port is more stable, reducing problem such as reboots and crashes. Type C USB data cable is only used to link your PC for playback.

🚗💥【Daily Driving Settings Dash Cam】- In order to use dashcam better, we have following suggestions: 1. When you're driving, turn off parking mode, motion detection, auto power off and screensavers. Otherwise, it's easy to cause car camera to turn on and off, you can turn them on when parking. 2. Turn on loop recording, adjust G-sensor to "low". 3. Use original car charger to charge dash cam. 4. If met dash camera can't work, restore factory settings and poke the reset hole with the card pin.

🚗💥【Lifetime Warranty & Reliable Customer Care】- Our car on-dash mounted cameras has its own dash cam factory and professional engineer team, And professional after-sales team. We offer lifetime warranty and 1 month hassle-free return and 24/7 online after-sales customer service. If you have any questions or suggestions about car dashboard cam, please feel free to tell us.I hope you can give us a chance to experience this dash cameras for cars, you will have the best value for money experience.

IMPORNATA THING YOU NEED TO KNOW! Please note: Due to customer feedback that the video clip has a watermark, it is not convenient to edit, but some customers say that they want a watermark. So for the different needs of customers, we have made such optimization, if you set the resolution of this dash cam to 2.5K, the watermark will be displayed when playing on the computer, but if you set the resolution of the dash cam to 1080P, the watermark will not be displayed when playing on the computer. I hope you know this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value and has clear video!
reviews.reviewText: Works very well. Installation isn’t real hard with video reviews and planning. Cameras work very well and images are sharp. I like many of the features. Easy app to smartphone with WiFi, set up with multiple features. I put one in my Toyota Camry and another in our Subaru Outback. I bought a multiplug adaptor for the cigarette lighter feed for the outback and have run the power cord to the inside of the console. I like the little tune it sends when it is turned on or off. Changing the screen is easy with 5 options. Downloading images or videos is easy as well as taking a snapshot. The loop recording feature is very good! I have it set at 1 minute, but 2 minutes and 5 minutes are options!! Price is very good for features offered, and all the wiring is included except for an alternate power source to operate the parking monitoring. The wiring is there to make the rear camera work in backup mode. The windshield suction mount is extremely well made, no issues if windshield is cleaned well before installation. Would I buy it again? Yes! Bought 2 to start with and am very pleased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is a nice little camera, easy to install and operate, great price too! would recommend to buy to all

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Overall a very nice little dashcam. The ability to grab videos or screenshots off of the dashcam without pulling the memory card is very handy.The quality of the video and screenshots are decent for what you need and its not bad to install, no better or worse than installing any other dashcam.I do dislike having to install a special app for everything nowadays, but I get it and its worth it to have access to the cam when you need it, like after an accident or incident.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dash cam!
reviews.reviewText: This product is wonderful, especially for the price! It's totally worth it, when I was deciding which one to buy I ultimately settled on this one because it has an app that's you can delete or save videos through and it's really user friendly. I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice unit for the price
reviews.reviewText: Camera is small & easy to install. Unit worked out of the box. The rear camera cable wasn't long enough to reach the back bumper of my Tacoma after going thru the head liner & down the left A post thru the fire wall and followed factory wiring to back bumper. I emailed seller and they sent me a longer cable no problem & no cost that's a A+ for the seller. Daytime clarity of the picture is better than my older cheap camera & rear view as well. Have not tried it at night. So, all & all I'm satisfied with it for the cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The picture quality of this Dash Cam Front and Rear is excellent! I was impressed not only with the product but also with the customer service. They were quick to assist with shipping a cord extension for my SUV. I highly recommend this product for its top-notch performance and outstanding customer support. Great investment for peace of mind on the road!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: this product was a waste of an upgrade. I got it for the wifi and firstly it doesnt work when camera is off, 2nd You Have to be literally in your car while its running so you can keep the cam running. And then you still cant connect. I think it connected one time for me. I Purposly got this for the sole purpose of the wifi and it sucks. The only reasons why i wouldnt return it is simply becasue I have already installed the cam and set the wiring and dont want to deal with the traffic and hassle to take it back

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and works well
reviews.reviewText: Decent price for added protection just in case, and the overwriting of the oldest video is a huge plus for someone that is using it for that reason as you won't be constantly going in and removing old video. I personally suggest the biggest SD card available (that will work) though as HD video fills them up fast.

this is a really good dashcam! i have 5 cars and this is by far the best so far! excellent resolution , videos are smooth and clean, and no pixelation like the other 'HD' dashcams i've owned. comes with 64G microsd which is a bonus.the camera lens is a bit too much wide angle so cars look further in video than they arescreen size is small so if you are using for backup camera it may be harder to see.otherwise very happy with purchase so far and customer service with the vendor is great!

reviews.reviewTitle: Good quality and value for the money
reviews.reviewText: Quality of video is very good for the price, I am not sure whether it is 2.5K but it is better than my old 1080 one.The only problem is that my Windows 11 PC cannot see the cam.Anyway the customer service is prompt and helpful to handle my problem. I got 2 units with the same problem. I think it needs a firmware update.Other than this , it is a very good unit for the price for both front and rear cam.Latest update:After serval communications with customer service , right now I can view the cam files on my PC. They are going to update the user manual. In order to hook up to the PC , the cam needs to be set on charging mode instead of the mass storage mode as mentioned on the manual.
It’s has a clear crisp view. Easy to install. Great price as well

Open box and testing all parts, working well!at this price range, this set is the king in terms of value!2.5k front, 1080 rear, 3" screen, reversing gear auto image, WIFI connection, cell APP, 64 G memory card, this has all!Parts material feels solid as well.

Camera arrived quickly. Easy to install both front & rear cameras. I haven't tested out picture or video quality via SD card yet so will have to come back with an update. Video quality while playing back from the camera appears to be good quality. (I still need to test out night time video quality).Like many others have said about this dash cam, it is very good value for the price point. (Clock setting is 24 hour format only which I didn't like but not a deal breaker).Very fast responses by their customer service. I did inquire with the seller about a hardwire kit, which they offered to send out and arrived in about 10 days.
